'''''The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must be devoured twice in a single fight against the [[All-Devouring Narwhal]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The All-Devouring Narwhal cannot devour the player if it is below 20% of its Max HP.

==Trivia==
* The title of this achievement is a reference to the comedy science fiction franchise ''{{w|The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy}}'' by {{w|Douglas Adams}}.
** This particular reference was likely named due to the sperm whale that came into existence after a guided missile's interaction with the Infinite Improbability Drive in the book.
